CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local Index = UISelf:GetBuildIndex(); if Index == 0 then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(403803)) elseif Index == 1 then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(403802)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(403804)) end

FORM.SCRIPT:
UISelf:SetUVIndex(1)
local ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark.tga" local iGrade = 0 if nil~=g_pilotMan then iGrade = g_pilotMan:GetPremiumGrade() end if 1==iGrade then ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark2.tga" elseif 2==iGrade then ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark3.tga" end UISelf:ChangeImage(ImagePath) UISelf:SetInvalidate(true)

UISelf:SetUVIndex(1)
local ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark_s.tga" local iGrade = 0 if nil~=g_pilotMan then iGrade = g_pilotMan:GetPremiumGrade() end if 1==iGrade then ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark2_s.tga" elseif 2==iGrade then ImagePath = "../Data/6_ui/main/mnPmMark3_s.tga" end UISelf:ChangeImage(ImagePath) UISelf:SetInvalidate(true)

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT: local kWnd = GetUIWnd("BTN_BIG_PREMIUM") if kWnd:IsNil() then kWnd = GetUIWnd("BTN_SMALL_PREMIUM") end if false==kWnd:IsNil() then local iPosX = (kWnd:GetLocation():GetX() + kWnd:GetSize():GetX()/2) - (UISelf:GetSize():GetX()/2) local iPosY = kWnd:GetLocation():GetY() + kWnd:GetSize():GetY() UISelf:SetLocation( Point2(iPosX,iPosY) ) end UISelf:SetSize( Point2(290,30) )
